alert.note: Alert for Blount; Etowah; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:54PM CDT until April 06 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BLOUNT...WESTERN ETOWAH AND NORTH CENTRAL ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oneonta, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rainbow City, Oneonta, Steele, Altoona, Susan Moore, Walnut Grove, Rosa, Aurora, Alabama International Dragway, Howelton, Gallant, Rockledge, Horse Pens Forty, Camp Sumatanga, Hendrix and Ramsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
